name: Bully Simulator
description:
Bully Simulator is an interactive visual novel set at an elite school. The protagonist is an Asian girl named Mei that recently transferred to this school. During the game she meets two characters, Elliot, her nerdy and kind friend, and Angela, a cruel and arrogant girl that bullies her for being Asian. Bully Simulator is a fairly large game, consisting of a soundtrack, sound effects, advanced character animations, choices, and multiple endings.  Each of these endings removes the threat of Angela in different ways.
